name: claude-workspace-plugins
description: Production-tested Claude Code plugins for modern development workflows

plugins.name: 021BE
plugins.description: Python/FastAPI Clean Architecture backend development guidelines with domain entities, use cases, and repository patterns. Includes dev-docs-be command for creating comprehensive technical requirement specifications.

plugins.name: 021FE
plugins.description: React/TypeScript/Tanstack Query/Tanstack Router frontend development guidelines. Includes dev-docs-fe command for creating comprehensive technical requirement specifications.

plugins.name: essentials
plugins.description: Essential utilities including specialized agents (documentation architect, planning, research), expert consultation skills, skill development tools, dev-docs-update command, and intelligent hooks for enhanced development workflow
